TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division B Regional 3
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

School Name:

Check your team: ◻ Varsity ◻ JV1 JV2 ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.83.cipherString: I didn't go to the moon, I went much further--for time is the longest distance between two places.
CIPHER.83.question: Decode this quote from Tennessee Williams which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.83.author: Tennessee Williams (Thomas Lanier Williams) 1911-83

CIPHER.94.cipherString: Those benefiting from the status quo, resist change.
CIPHER.94.question: The following letters encode a quote by Rajen Jani using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?
CIPHER.94.author: Rajen Jani

CIPHER.85.cipherString: Every evil to which we do not succumb is a benefactor; we gain the strength of the temptation we resist.
CIPHER.85.question: Decode this quote from Emerson which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.85.author: Emerson.

CIPHER.96.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 9782 1735 0644. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.106.cipherString: An expert is someone who knows some of the worst mistakes that can be made in his subject and how to avoid them.
CIPHER.106.question: A quote by Werner Heisenberg has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.106.author: Werner Heisenberg

CIPHER.97.cipherString: Learning is not the accumulation of knowledge, but rather, one thing only: understanding
CIPHER.97.question: Decode this quote from Donna Jo Napoli which has been encoded with the Complete Columnar Cipher. You are told that it contains the letters LYUNDER.
CIPHER.97.author: Donna Jo Napoli

CIPHER.102.cipherString: Its not where you live your life; its how you live your life that matters more.
CIPHER.102.question: The following quote by Francis Shenstone needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of STAR and polybius key of ASTROBIOLOGY.
CIPHER.102.author: Francis Shenstone

CIPHER.87.cipherString: Projects we have completed demonstrate what we know - future projects decide what we will learn.
CIPHER.87.question: A quote by Mohsin Tiwana has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it ends with EARN.
CIPHER.87.author: Mohsin Tiwana

CIPHER.105.cipherString: Patience is the key of content.
CIPHER.105.question: The following quote by Mahomet. needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=5 and b=19.
CIPHER.105.author: Mahomet.

CIPHER.104.cipherString: Esta nación seguirá siendo la tierra de los libres sólo mientras sea el hogar de los valientes.
CIPHER.104.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Elmer Davis into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword. It contains the word SOLO.
CIPHER.104.author: Elmer Davis
CIPHER.104.translation: This nation will remain the land of the free only so long as it is the home of the brave.

CIPHER.103.cipherString: An opportunity is often lost through deliberation.
CIPHER.103.question: The following odd symbols were found on a sheet of paper when a tomb was opened, but you recognized it as the Baconian alphabet, written by a prankster. It turns out to be a quote by Publius Syrus.  What does it say?
CIPHER.103.author: Publius Syrus

CIPHER.101.cipherString: Education makes a people easy to lead, but difficult to drive; easy to govern, but impossible to enslave.
CIPHER.101.question: Decode this quote from Lord Brougham  which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.101.author: Lord Brougham

CIPHER.84.cipherString: Make friends on your way up since you might need them on your way down.
CIPHER.84.question: The following quote by Dr. Lucas D. Shallua needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of RING.
CIPHER.84.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

CIPHER.91.cipherString: When ewe have a num-brr of dis-a-gre-bull doo-ties to purr-form, all-weighs dew the moose dis-a-gre-bull furst.
CIPHER.91.question: Decode the message from Josiah Quincy which was encoded with a K1 Aristocrat Cipher (after being run through a ‘sus' dictation system).
CIPHER.91.author: Josiah Quincy

CIPHER.95.cipherString: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
CIPHER.95.question: Solve this quote from Laurence Sterne which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.95.author: Sterne.

CIPHER.93.cipherString: We have to go for what we think we're fully capable of, not limit ourselves by what we've been in the past.
CIPHER.93.question: A quote by Vivek Paul has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.93.author: Vivek Paul

CIPHER.100.cipherString: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
CIPHER.100.question: A quote by Robert F. Kennedy has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has CAN EVER in it corresponding to the encoded text F T N D T A S R Y.
CIPHER.100.author: Robert F. Kennedy

CIPHER.86.cipherString: You don't get strong by standing at the finish line, you get strong with every step you take to get there.
CIPHER.86.question: Decode this quote from Toni Sorenson which has been encoded with a Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.86.author: Toni Sorenson

CIPHER.99.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 378462 187 904425. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.92.cipherString: Inflict not on an enemy every injury in your power, for he may afterwards become your friend.
CIPHER.92.question: Decode this quote from Saadi which has been encoded with the Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told it contains the letters WERFORH.
CIPHER.92.author: Saadi.

CIPHER.90.cipherString: my friends don't seem to be friends at all but people whose phone numbers I haven't lost.
CIPHER.90.question: The following quote by Nick Hornby needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of RAINS and polybius key of HYDRODYNAMIC.
CIPHER.90.author: Nick Hornby

CIPHER.89.cipherString: There is more mental health cure found in a pile of dirt than in all the behavioral therapy and drugs in modern medical science.
CIPHER.89.question: Solve this quote by J.S.B. Morse that has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K2 keyword.  You are told that it ends with ENCE.
CIPHER.89.author: J.S.B. Morse

CIPHER.88.question: The following quote by Karla M. Nashar needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=5 and b=9.
CIPHER.88.author: Karla M. Nashar

CIPHER.98.cipherString: Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you.
CIPHER.98.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Stephanie Klein using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text contains SOME somewhere.
CIPHER.98.author: Stephanie Klein

CIPHER.107.cipherString: One needs to be slow to form convictions, but once formed they must be defended against the heaviest odds.
CIPHER.107.question: A quote by Gandhi has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it ends with ODDS.
CIPHER.107.author: Gandhi
